tab1.text1:
Welcome to PvE Server with x3 Harvest, x12 Taming, x50 Breeding (With easy mutation mods)

=== Features === 
- Shiny dinos with improved level with big rolls on good stats for make your best breeding dinos
- Danger Shiny like a boss, with chibi exp, rewards, and unlock your tek engrams
- Upgrade station to early item upgrades (balanced)
- Improved crate drops
- Improved dino harvest resources
- Improved/balanced player stats, dicovery it by yourself
- Improved breeding  & imprinting (with all can cuddle)
- Balanced Mods config
- QoL Mods

tab2.text1:
Beware, if you don't respect this rules, you can be punished in your progress without any warning, also in the worst case can be kicked from the servers.


- Don't build near to other bases or trying to grief another builds
- Don't grief another players
- Don't leave taming structures forever
- Don't block the access to explore notes
- Don't block artifact caves/player bases/spawn points, or any kind of griefing type
- Respect other players taming
- Don't lock the resource extractors like Oil/Gas (be friendly with other players)
- Don't abuse any exploit
- Don't make titanic ultra mega builds to just lag the server


Anyone who report an exploit will be rewarded.
